reviews.title: Convenient for the town centre & railway station
reviews.text: Situated close to the old town (10mins) on the main street and a few minutes walk from the railway station, the Best Western Pannoia is a charming hotel.The service is good. The lobby, bar & restaurant are impressive. There is a jacuzzi, pool and Sauna, as well as a fitness room. The bedroom are like any standard room. Enjoyed the location, breakfast and amenities. 5* for great value in a small town
